alert.note: Alert for Bennett; Mellette; Todd; Tripp (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 3:44PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Todd, southwestern Tripp, south central Mellette and southeastern Bennett Counties through 430 PM MDT/530 PM CDT/... At 344 PM MDT/444 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 5 miles northwest of Clearfield to 2 miles north of Lakeview to 6 miles south of Tuthill. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mission, Rosebud, Saint Francis, Parmelee, Okreek, Spring Creek, Tuthill, Millboro, Keyapaha, Upper Cut Meat, Soldier Creek, Harrington, Sicangu Village, Two Strike, Fairgrounds Housing, Grass Mountain, Littleburg, He Dog, Lakeview and Ring Thunder. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
